import React, { Component, Route, Router } from "react"; import logo from "../img/logook.jpg"; import HirdetesekComponent from "./HirdetesekComponent"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; class Header extends Component { state = { activated: false, activatedLogin: false, body: null, headers: null, }; loginClk() { fetch("https://api.example.com/items") .then(res => res.json()) axios .post("http://localhost:8081/oauth/token", { Accept: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", // Authorization: "Basic " + btoa("CLIENTID:SECRET"), client_id: "CLIENTID", client_secret: "SECRET", grant_type: "password", email: "asd@asd.asd", password: "asdasdasd", // headers: { // Accept: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", // "WWW-Authenticate": "Basic " + btoa("CLIENTID:SECRET"), // }, }) .then((respose) => { console.log(respose); }); } loginMenu = () => { this.setState({ activatedLogin: !this.state.activatedLogin, }); }; toggleMenu = () => { this.setState({ activated: !this.state.activated, }); }; render() { const activat = this.state.activated ? "show" : ""; const activated = this.state.activatedLogin ? "show-login" : ""; return (
